text: The Wikipedia Monument () is a statue designed by Armenian sculptor Mihran Hakobyan honoring Wikipedia contributors. It is located in Słubice, Poland. The fiber and resin sculpture cost about 50,000 złotys (about $14,000; 12,000 euros). It was funded by Słubice regional authorities. It was unveiled in Frankfurt Square (Plac Frankfurcki) on 22 October 2014 in a ceremony that included representatives from both local Wikimedia chapters and the Wikimedia Foundation. ==References== ==Other websites== * Press release: First-ever Wikipedia Monument unveiled in Poland, Wikimedia Foundation Category:Wikimedia Category:Statues Category:2014 works Category:2010s in art
title: Wikipedia Monument
